Module
ActiveRecord
In: lib/restfulx/active_foo.rb lib/restfulx.rb

Flex friendly ActiveRecord patches. More specifically XML serialization improvements. These won‘t override whatever you may normally do with XML, hence there‘s Flex specific name for this stuff to_fxml.
